name: COCO by the POUND: Cloning with the Crew
description:
This is attempt at coco by the pound. A nice chocolate pound cake. Pretty spot on imo. Enjoy. 

Recipes notes here=====> https://youtu.be/nYfXUseUn_Q

Join us on our Facebook group new mixers always welcome.
author: shakenvape007

reviews.text:
Another "never tried the original but..." Reviews. This is really good. Excellent rich chocolate cake vape. Little sweet but that can be adjusted. Besides, it's a remix. 
Well done & thanks for sharing üëç
